pumpProbeStandardsSet.description:
EU/PHEO/Hb standards set at combination of 695/803nm and 720/803nm pump/probe. Data recorded 2013-07-05 by MJS with help from SD and CPD, compiled 2013-07-08 MJS.
Four standards: eumelanin, both EDTA-washed and iron-loaded; synthetic pheomelanin, and hemoglobin.

pumpProbeStandard.name: eumelanin(EDTA)
pumpProbeStandard.description: EDTA-washed eumelanin, dry powder on a slide

pumpProbeStandard.name: eumelanin(Fe)
pumpProbeStandard.description: Iron-loaded eumelanin, dry powder on a slide

pumpProbeStandard.name: pheomelanin
pumpProbeStandard.description: synthetic pheomelanin, dry powder on a slide
